altTitles.en: We Must Never Fall in Love!

altTitles.ar: يجب ألا تقع في الحب أبدًا !

altTitles.ja: 絶対にときめいてはいけない！

altTitles.th: ห้ามใจไว้อย่าให้ตึกตัก

altTitles.id: You Must Never Be In Love

description.en:
After getting turned down by the guy she had a crush on for ages, Sakura thought things couldn't get much worse... until she realized that she had been seen! Embarrassed, defeated, and exhausted, the only thing keeping her going was that she was about to meet her cute little step-brother... until it turns out that her "cute little brother" was not only a tall, handsome guy in her class, but he was the one who'd seen her get rejected! Now Sakura has to pretend everything is cool, but with an over-protective "little brother" who sees the best in Sakura, and an aloof crush who starts to take an interest, Sakura's high-school life will be anything but easy!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **You Must Never Be In Love** (2019)
description.pt-br: Depois de ser rejeitada pelo cara por quem ela tinha uma queda por anos, Sakura pensou que as coisas não poderiam ficar muito piores… até que ela percebeu que tinha sido vista! Envergonhada, derrotada e exausta, a única coisa que a fazia continuar era que ela estava prestes a conhecer seu meio-irmão bonitinho… até descobrir que seu “irmãozinho bonitinho” não era apenas um cara alto e bonito nela. classe, mas foi ele quem a viu ser rejeitada! Agora Sakura tem que fingir que está tudo bem, mas com um “irmãozinho” superprotetor que vê o melhor em Sakura, e uma paixão indiferente que começa a se interessar, a vida de Sakura no ensino médio será tudo menos fácil!
